title: ISic003411. Tile inscribed with funerary epitaph
body:
1ἡμέρᾳ Σαβ(βά)τ(ου)
2Ἰαγάθη

1ΗΜΕΡΑΣΑΒΤ
2ΙΑΓΑΘΗ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Ferrua 1989

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Iagathe, on the day of the sabbath

commentary

The difficulty of reading this text means that there are multiple alternative readings and some intepret the cross as a menorah and so read this as a Jewish text instead.

bibliography

  • Fiorelli NSA 1880 36 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Manganaro 1961 197 fig.22 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001852
  • Ferrua 1989 no.474 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
  • Wessel 1989 246 no. 1055 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
  • Manganaro 2004-2005 364 fig.5 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10003134
  • Muscolino 2011-2012 229 G17 fig.12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002215
